quotes.quote: No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.
You are most beautiful when your eyes are glowing with kindness and joy.
When you believe that you are beautiful, other people are bound to think the same.
The moon and the stars don't glow as bright as your eyes, you are extremely beautiful.
It's okay to wake up and look however you look. You are beautiful regardless.

To the people who love you, you are beautiful already. This is not because they're blind to your shortcomings but because they so clearly see your soul. Your shortcomings then dim by comparison. The people who care about you are willing to let you be imperfect and beautiful, too.
It is in the power that you have the ability to tell people you are beautiful that you become beautiful in their eyes.
You are beautiful in every single way. Words can't bring you down.
If you realized how beautiful you are, you would fall at your own feet.
How dare the world define beauty. God defined beauty when he made you! You are beautiful, you are a true beauty just the way you are!
You're beautful. Yes you are, you're very very beautiful. Extremely beautiful.
You are loved. You are wonderfully made. You are beautiful. You have purpose. You are a masterpiece.
Want to know a secret? Someone out there can't stop thinking about you. You are beautiful. Don't ever believe differently.
You are beautiful and perfect and lovely however you are.
It's not the face, but the expressions on it. It's not the voice, but what you say. It's not how you look in that body, but the thing you do with it. You are beautiful.
You are a beautiful and wonderful soul. Recognise and illuminate it.
Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.Â
You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.
Just because you're not thin does not mean you're ugly. You are beautiful because of the light you carry inside you. You are beautiful because you say you are, and you hold yourself that way.
No matter who you are, no matter where you come from, you are beautiful.
By choosing healthy over skinny you are choosing self-love over self-judgment. You are beautiful!
You are beautiful. Your beauty, just like your capacity for life, happiness, and success, is immeasurable.
The beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
To all the girls that think you're fat because you're not a size zero, you're the beautiful one, its society who's ugly.
Everybody feels like [a misfit] at different points in their life. If you feel like who you are is right for you, then you are beautiful.
Try your hardest to be confident in who you are. You are enough - you are beautiful.
You are beautiful just the way you are.
You are beautiful when you are happy.
There is nobody more beautiful in this world that a woman in love, so there is nobody more beautiful than you.
You are worthy of love and respect. You are beautiful, gifted, and intelligent. Don't let the storm make you forget it
